doc:
Stephanie Martin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stephanie_Martin 0 Stephanie Martin, sometimes credited as Stéphanie Martin, is an American and Canadian singer-songwriter and actress having performed in notable musical productions in both French and English. She is best known for her role as Éponine in 3 productions of the musical Les Misérables and as the Québécoise singing voice of Pocahontas in Disney's 1995 animation Pocahontas. Stephanie_Martin , sometimes_credited as Stéphanie_Martin , is an_American_and_Canadian_singer-songwriter_and_actress having_performed in notable_musical_productions in both_French_and_English . She is_best_known for her_role as Éponine in 3_productions of the_musical_Les_Misérables and as the_Québécoise_singing_voice of Pocahontas in Disney 's 1995_animation Pocahontas .
